metadata.title: CVE-2024-8612 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in QEMU, in the virtio-scsi, virtio-blk, and virtio-cryptodevices. The size for virtqueue_push as set in virtio_scsi_complete_req /virtio_blk_req_complete / virito_crypto_req_complete could be larger thanthe true size of the data which has been sent to guest. Oncevirtqueue_push() finally calls dma_memory_unmap to ummap the in_iov, it maycall the address_space_write function to write back the data. Someuninitialized data may exist in the bounce.buffer, leading to aninformation leak.

criterions.comment: qemu package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
